roleset.name: to divide into smaller, quarrelsome and ineffectual groups

role.descr: resulting state of arg1, secondary predication on arg1

example.name: Transitive
example.text: There are efforts to expand it and generalize it in the region, or what is sometimes called *PRO* balkanizing the region, like what happened after the collapse of the Soviet Union.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'balkanize' based on instances in Webtext 2.5-2. Comparison to 'sovietize.'
